module.name: Phonebook Directory
module.description: Provides a dial-by-name directory for phonebook entries
module.changelog: *2.11.0.6* FREEPBX-15370 Phonebook dial-by-name directory feature code broken *2.11.0.5* Add sound languages: it,fr,en_GB *2.11.0.4* FREEPBX-9951 Japanese language prompts *2.11.0.3* Localize sound prompts *2.11.0.2* Fix depends *2.11.0.1* Include license file *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.2* #4934 *2.9.0.1* moved sound files out of subdir and renamed *2.9.0.0* #4653
